Requirement_Description: Primary electrical generation via fuel cells
Backup power via APU for 30 minutes minimum
Battery storage for peak loads and emergency
Power quality THD <5% on all buses
Fuel cell efficiency >55% at cruise power
Waste heat recovery for cabin heating
CO2 capture energy penalty <10% cruise power
Automatic load shedding in degraded mode
Energy data logging at 1 Hz minimum
Predictive energy demand for mission planning
Energy efficiency reporting per flight cycle
Electrical system redundancy: dual bus architecture
Bus cross-tie capability for load balancing
Energy asset lifecycle tracking in DPP
